long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: the option /multimedia:decoder:gstreamer or /dvc:tsmf,decoder:gstreamer not work
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): freerdp-1.2.0-0.2.beta.1
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1.install codec in client machine 2.using xfreerdp connect to RDP server without codec 3.using WMP to play mp4 video
Actual results: no video, only black screen
Expected results: with video
Additional info: changing -DSTATIC_CHANNELS=OFF to -DSTATIC_CHANNELS=ON may fix it.

Hello, is the problem fixed in the latest builds? Could you please check if the problem is still there? The build flags have changed substantially.
Thanks, --Simone
Would you be able to upgrade to at least Fedora 21 (current release) or better Fedora 22?
freerdp-1.2.0-0.6.beta.1.fc21.2 still compiled with -DSTATIC_CHANNELS=OFF and has no local decoding, but with -DSTATIC_CHANNELS=ON it works.

freerdp-2.0.0-23.20170302git210de68.fc25 seems work, but get message: [ERROR][com.winpr.library] - GetProcAddress: could not find procedure freerdp_tsmf_client_subsystem_entry: /usr/lib64/freerdp2/libtsmf-client-gstreamer-decoder.so: undefined symbol: freerdp_tsmf_client_subsystem_entry
